name: bank_statement
description: Extract information from bank statements including account details, transactions, balances, and financial summary data
prompt: Extract bank statement information including account holder details, account numbers, statement period, transactions with dates and amounts, beginning and ending balances, and fee information. Preserve exact financial data and transaction details.
